=======
CHANGES
=======

0.1.2 (2010-09-22)
------------------

- Added test extra to declare test dependency on ``zope.testing``.

- Using Pyhton's ``doctest`` module instead of depreacted
  ``zope.testing.doctest``.


0.1.1 (2008-04-18)
------------------

- Bug: Fix release to include CHANGES.txt.


0.1.0 (2007-07-30)
------------------

- Initial Release.
